short_summary: procure an Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS) through a software as a service (SaaS)
description: The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)/* Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) has a requirement to procure an Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS) through a software as a service (SaaS). The intent of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to award one (1) Contract for the services. The initial contract period is two (2) years from contract award, with the provision of up to eight (8) additional one (1) year option periods, under the same terms and conditions.
tags: Occupational Health and Safety Management System (OHSMS)
